overview: YOON follows the regular round trip taken by Senegalese routier Mbaye Sow, in an old Peugeot 504, along the 4000 kilometres that separate the two places he calls home – Portugal and Senegal. It’s a perilous and lonesome journey south, filled with (mis)encounters and all kinds of challenges and compromises, where a complex network of relationships and grey areas must be navigated.
title: Yoon
